content: 100% wool mc celestial leaves edamame flowers safflower serrano sky sweet potato fairy tale instructions note both hands are made the same with a centered thumb so just make two with mc cast on 60 sts distribute on needles according to your preferred method of working join for working in round work k2 p2 rib for 6 rnds breaking and adding colors as necessary work chart to thumb gusset thumb gusset begin thumb gusset on round 16 following colors as charted work gusset increases as follows first round of thumb gusset work hand stitches up to placement of gusset place marker increase 1 st with flower color using a backwards loop cast on place marker then continue hand chart to end of round slip markers as you knit so the thumb stitches stay between them on rounds where no increase is indicated knit across gusset in colors indicated on chart ©2014 by karen porter please do not knit this pattern for commercial resale pattern support sweatergoddess@hotmail com 2 egap next increase third round of gusset chart round 18 m1r with flower color k1 with mc m1l with flower color remaining increases as indicated on chart working colors as charted work the next and all subsequent thumb gusset increases as follows k1 m1r k to last st m1l k1 this means the increases will actually be on the inside of each outer gusset stitch after last round of gussett round 41 work hand stitches to first marker remove marker using a tapestry needle threaded with waste yarn slip the 21 thumb gusset stitches onto the waste yarn you will again have 60 hand sts remove second marker and continue hand pattern to end of round complete hand chart break all yarns except mc k 2 rnds mc then work 6 rnds k2 p2 rib bobble in rib thumb place the 21 thumb stitches on needles distribute as desired for working with mc pick up and knit one stitch from hand knit 21 thumb stitches then pick up 2 more at hand 24 sts total k 2 rounds work 6 rnds k2 p2 rib bobble in rib weave in ends and enjoy knitting abbreviations k knit p purl st sts stitch stiches round round m1r make one right right-leaning increase with left needle pick up bar between stitches from behind knit through front of loop m1l make one left left-leaning increase with left needle pick up bar between stitches from front knit through the back loop note on m1 increases when working rounds with two colors you will have bars or floats of both colors behind your work pick up the appropriate color to make the increase ex if your increased stitch should be cream pick up the cream bar or float bobble bind off ©2014 by karen porter
